New Records: LeBron and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together.
Key Match Events: Anthony Davis recorded a double-double with 36 points and 16 rebounds.
LeBron James hit a huge 3-pointer to pad the Lakers' lead late in the game.
Jaxson Hayes made a significant dunk.
Mike Conley lobbed it to Rudy Gobert for a dunk.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, CA with an attendance of 18,997.
